note: Profile Alt Text: the profile picture is a white Orthodox Christian Cross, ‘A’ in a circle alongside the characters IC XC and a crown of thorns on a plain background. I discuss leftist theory, particularly when it intertwines with Christian scripture. I have opinions but mostly questions. I enjoy various viewpoints and if you do to feel free to follow. Mt. 5:38-42, 6:24, Lk. 4:18-19, Ac. 2:44-45, Is. 1:17, Ro. 12:2
